General.Name: Regent Pacific Properties Inc
General.Description: Regent Pacific Properties Inc. operates as a real estate development and investment company in Canada. The company invests in residential and commercial properties. Its portfolio consists of three-storey commercial office tower and attached single-storey bays with underground parking facility; and 15 residential apartment-style condominium units in a 119 unit condominium project located in Edmonton, Alberta. Regent Pacific Properties Inc. is based in Edmonton, Canada.
General.Address: 2607 Ellwood Drive SW, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T6X 0P7
